about_the_game:
"Don't Let It Die" smoothly transitions from board game to the digital world, offering a dramatic survival experience with strategic depth. It combines tribe building, resource management and adaptability in a compact, engaging, replayable experience.

The adventure begins with a momentous event: a lightning strike igniting a lone tree, bestowing your tribe with the gift of fire. This monumental discovery becomes the cornerstone of your survival. Immerse yourself in a prehistoric world where your tribe's fate hangs in the balance, faced with the relentless threats of a bygone era.

Hunger, predators, and the unforgiving elements are formidable foes, but the battle to keep the flame alive against all odds adds a vital layer to your strategic considerations. Will you prioritize gathering food, fueling the ever hungry flame, or crafting vital tools and weapons? Each decision could mean the difference between the prosperity and the extinction of your tribe.

KEY FEATURES


  • 17 Unique Characters, Endless Strategies

    Dive into a rich tapestry of survival strategies with 17 distinct characters, each boasting their own skills and specialties. With over 2,380 potential team combinations, the possibilities are limitless. Experiment to discover the most effective synergy for your tribe and pave your way to victory.

  • Resource Management at Its Finest

    Venture into the untamed wilderness to gather essential resources - berries, plant fiber, rocks, meat, wood, hide, and bone. Strategic efficiency is key to managing these scarce commodities effectively. Leverage the unique abilities of your characters, equip them with crafted items, and unlock new discoveries to fully harness their potential.

  • Fire Discoveries - The Path to Victory

    The heart of your tribe's survival lies in the mysteries of fire. Choose from 4 Fire Knowledge Tree difficulties and embark on a quest to unveil its secrets before it's too late. Earn Fire Knowledge Points (FKP) through investigating the fire and spend them on breakthrough discoveries. Achieving the ultimate knowledge, "Fire Starter," signifies your triumph over nature's challenges and the birth of civilization as we know it.

  • Master Craftsmanship for Survival

    Your survival arsenal includes an array of tools, weapons, and buildings - each indispensable in your quest for survival. Craft what you need to gather resources, fend off predators, and bolster your tribe's chances of survival. From simple stone tools to elaborate shelters, what you create will shape your tribe's destiny.

A Message From Dustin


Creating "Don't Let It Die" has been more than just developing a game; it's been a personal journey for me. Transitioning this experience from a physical board game to a digital format was driven by a vision to share the thrill of survival and strategy with a broader audience, ensuring that every aspect of the game's essence was not only preserved but also enhanced for an immersive digital experience.

This journey has been fueled by countless hours of dedication, from conceptualization to the final touches that make the game stand out. My passion for game design and my desire to create meaningful, engaging experiences have been the guiding forces behind this project.

As you dive into the prehistoric world of "Don't Let It Die," know that every element has been crafted with care, aiming to challenge, entertain, and inspire. The transition from board game to digital platform is a testament to my dedication to this game and to you, the players, who make this journey truly rewarding. Together, let's keep the flame alive, facing the challenges that lie ahead with strategy, cooperation, and perseverance.

highlighted.name: Toss One Hundred On The Fire

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS or later, SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent AMD
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ compatible GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ALSA compatible sound card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 Catalina or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or external sound card, macOS compatible

movies.name: Don't Let It Die Teaser Trailer

name: Don't Let It Die

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-core 2GHz CPU
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: As the first tribe to discover fire, master its creation amidst prehistoric survival challenges. Synergize 17+ unique characters, items, and strategize to ignite your legacy and secure humanity's dawn. A quest for fire's mastery awaits those with the will to not only survive, but thrive.
